title: Requirements Gathering
description: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document project requirements, ensuring they are clear, concise, and feasible within the project scope.

title: Design the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Create a high-level design for the system architecture and user interfaces

title: Develop the Frontend Interface
description: Implement a user-friendly and intuitive interface for controlling and interacting with the NeuralCreativityAmplifier system. The interface should allow users to adjust settings, monitor progress, and receive feedback on their creative output.

title: Implement the Backend Logic
description: Develop the server-side logic for processing and responding to user inputs

title: Integrate Database Functionality
description: Design and implement a robust database schema for efficient storage of user data, system logs, and machine learning models relevant to the NeuralCreativityAmplifier. Consider scalability, data security, and easy querying.

title: Test the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Execute functional and performance tests on the system to ensure correctness and efficiency. This includes testing the entire system from frontend interface, backend logic, to database functionality.

title: Deploy the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Prepare and execute deployment procedures for production environment

title: Review and Approve Design Documents
description: Review design documents for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to project requirements

title: Review and Approve Requirements Document
description: Review requirements document for accuracy, completeness, and feasibility
